data.eml:eml: Ichneumonidae (Hymenoptera) associated with xyelid sawflies (Hymenoptera, Xyelidae) in Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I., Ruiz-Cancino, Enrique (2017): Ichneumonidae (Hymenoptera) associated with xyelid sawflies (Hymenoptera, Xyelidae) in Mexico. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 58: 17-27, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.58.12919, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.58.12919
